Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2013 10:57PM leanne1980 wrote: Hi, I had pre-existing neuropathy in my feet and fingertips from a previous cancer, leukaemia. I was diagnosed with BC 5 years after, not related at all. I had stage 1, grade 3 tumour with 5/25 nodes affected. I had Doxetaxol, carboplatin and Herceptin. I didn't really have any change in my feet, my finger tips got a bit weird for about a week after each treatment. I guess you will need to talk over this concern with your onc, as everyone is different. Good luck with your treatment
Posts.Title: Pre-existing neuropathy Catbuster Annie54
